contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I still speak" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I am not silent

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Come close to me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: Do not be far away from me

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Be very close" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: Do not be far away

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I have everything that I need" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I will lack nothing

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Those who fear him will always have what they need" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: There is no lack for those who fear him

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "will always have the good things they need" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: will not lack anything good

contextId.occurrenceNote: "do not ignore what they did" This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "judge them because of what they did" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: do not be silent

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "be very close to me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: do not be far from me

contextId.occurrenceNote: "I have not kept your righteousness a secret." This can also be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I have openly told every one about your righteousness" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I have not concealed your righteousness in my heart

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I have told everyone in the great assembly about your covenant faithfulness or your trustworthiness" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I have not concealed your covenant faithfulness or your trustworthiness from the great assembly

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is stated in negative form to intensify the number.See how you translated this in [Psalms 40:5](../040/005.md). Alternate translation: "that are vast in number" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: that cannot be numbered

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "respond quickly" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: do not delay

contextId.occurrenceNote: The writer uses this negative statement to emphasize the positive. Alternate translation: "speaks so that everyone can hear him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: does not stay silent

contextId.occurrenceNote: The writer uses a negative statement to stress how unstable and uncertain his condition is. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: there is no place to stand

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed as a positive statement. Alternate translation: "you know all my sins" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: my sins are not hidden from you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "please come quickly" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: do not delay

contextId.occurrenceNote: "Do not continue forever to do nothing to help your oppressed people." This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Come soon to help your oppressed people" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: Do not forget forever the life of your oppressed people

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I will always love David, and I will do what I promised to him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I will not remove my steadfast love from him or be unfaithful to my promise

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Possible meanings are 1) God corrects. Alternate translation: "he corrects" or 2) God punishes. "he punishes" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: does he not correct

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "He keeps their cattle very numerous" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: He does not let their cattle decrease in number

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I will always remember" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I will never forget

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I always remember your laws" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: I do not forget your law
